author: Karen Roland
text:
We are looking for copies of administrative policies/directives which provide direction to employees of the governemental agency on providing "Letters of Recommendations" for individuals or businesses.  Information we would like to be provided is directives of Who can write, What can be written, can it be on county letterhead, and to whom can receive letters.
For examples:
 may a staff member write a letter of recommendation for a coworker on government letter head?
 may a staff member write a letter for a vendor who provided service to the government?
 do letters have to come for the highest official of the department?
Please email any policies or directives that can assist us in updating our policy.
THank you
title: Policy/directives on Employees writing "letter of recommendations"
